channel.title: Sewing on Max Clinton
channel.description: Recent content in Sewing on Max Clinton

item.title: Learning to Sew Part 1
item.description: After the sudden and tragic death of Paul Vincent this summer and my brother making his own suit for a 1920s-inspired lawn party I have been inspired to learn sewing to make my own clothes. After much delay, I have finally started this journey and this is the first in what is planned to be a long series of posts documenting my foray into the art.
